name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Hubei. The delivery guy put the child in the box and went to deliver the food, and several enthusiastic citizens guarded by the side.
December 18, Zhejiang. The delivery guy left the child downstairs to deliver the food, and the property management silently guarded by the side.
December 15, Zhejiang. The delivery guy brought the child to deliver the food, and the outdoor temperature was only 4 degrees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Qiannan, Yunnan, a man was owed wages. After repeated requests for payment failed, he had no choice but to climb a crane and threaten to die. The man said: I want the money I deserve, and I want fairness.
Afterwards, although the leader agreed to pay, the man was detained for 6 days.
Netizens in the comment area also reported being detained for asking for wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: Some netizens reported that this was a report from two years ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hengyang City: Unfinished project owners collectively marched to the municipal government to defend their rights. Follow-up:
After the owners marched, the leaders of the Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau began to participate in negotiations to solve the problem and made some progress. The government began to raise funds for the owners to resume work.
Currently, the municipal government has withheld the tax refund from Country Garden, plus the disposal of the primary school land, which can raise nearly 100 million yuan in funds. A report is being submitted to the higher authorities to apply for use.
The chief of the public security bureau came forward and asked Country Garden to increase the number of construction workers to more than 100 within five days.
It really is true that the problem will not be solved without making a fuss.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 22, many official media reported: 72-year-old man found a new job, earning thousands of yuan a day by shooting short plays, and shot 100 short plays in 3 years

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Report on December 23: District head Zeng Pengxin, who was rumored to have kissed, hugged, and raped a married woman, resigned from his position as a NPC deputy.
It is reported that the Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision began to intervene in the investigation as early as October 22. Yesterday, the media reported that he had resigned from his position as a NPC deputy, but what the media did not mention was that he still retained his position as district head.
The whistleblower said: I believe in the organization.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, Weibo released this week's safety tips, which mentioned that the account @月亮湖视频 was permanently banned for collecting and posting videos of sudden and occasional negative social events.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, several official media outlets also reported: 
In 2002, a girl returned to the county town to drive a bus, earning 2,000 yuan a month, working one day and resting one day, and being able to eat her parents' meals, she was very happy. 
An associate professor at Tsinghua University said: County drifters are not just lying down, small cities are also living seriously. 
It is worth noting that since this year, we have received submissions from many local bus companies about wage arrears

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up on the tourist wearing a kimono at Nanjing Zhongshan Botanical Garden:
On December 23, staff at Nanjing Zhongshan Botanical Garden said that it was the tourist's personal behavior. They did not find him wearing a kimono when checking tickets into the garden. He changed into it after entering the garden. Wearing a kimono is prohibited in the garden. The tourist was persuaded to leave by staff that day. A notice prohibiting the wearing of kimonos will be posted at the gate later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, the official statement on the Tianmen Nursing Home cage incident changed again.
On the 21st, the town government issued a notice saying: The door was locked because an elderly person had been depressed before, and the road at the door was unsafe, so the door was locked.
On the 23rd, the municipal government changed its statement again, saying that the three elderly people who were locked up in the online video had recently behaved abnormally. In order to prevent them from destroying items again, they were temporarily placed in an unused institution. After the placement, the three people destroyed the sheets and cotton wool again. The three people are currently sent to a mental hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video circulating online shows that the government of Diquan Village in Anyang, Henan Province launched a free gift activity for opening a personal pension account

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Xinghai Conservatory of Music in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province installed a new access control system. The publicized budget is 1.2 million yuan. Someone posted the budget announcement in the dormitory group and complained about the unreasonableness of these doors. He was kicked out of the group chat by the staff of the logistics department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 21, The Paper published a news report: An Indian engineer suddenly fell ill in China. Huashan Hospital of Fudan University organized a team of experts to treat him. After four plasma exchanges, he was out of danger. All the medical staff took a group photo. The report aroused the anger of netizens. The Paper has deleted the report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that the domestic AI assistant Kimi is also very hypocritical when answering questions. It will refuse to answer any sensitive topics.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: The BMW i3 electric car specially made for China had a battery failure and needed to be replaced only two days after purchase.
On December 19, the BMW i3 he purchased had only been driven for two days and 200 kilometers when a battery alarm sounded during driving, requiring immediate parking. Then, during driving, the steering and power were suddenly lost, the car was forced into N gear, and all functions failed. The SOS emergency button failed, the double flash lights were ineffective, and the car key failed. It was towed back to the 4S shop, and now the 4S shop said it would only provide repairs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission Recently, near Erxin Street, University Town, Wencheng County, Wenzhou City, Zhejiang Province, a young man smashed another young man's head with a ceramic flower pot, table, etc., broke several wooden boards and sticks, and kicked the victim's head several times with the intention of killing him.
Someone sent it to TV stations and the Internet to expose it, but they were all blocked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution Recently, a group fight broke out among junior and senior high school students in Wencheng County, Wenzhou City. Many people on both sides hacked at each other with machetes. Netizen added: Wencheng is a famous hometown of overseas Chinese. Many overseas Chinese are in Italy. There are many left-behind children, which has brought many social problems. It is not clear whether the police have dealt with it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, a British blogger in Shenzhen posted a video complaining about the Chinese people's dedication to work: "No one quits even if they don't get paid for several months."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, the Beijing News reported: Some netizens posted on social media, exposing that someone suspected to be a Sam's Club purchasing agent was packaging cakes in the toilet. In the exposed pictures, the packaged cakes were placed on the toilet floor, and cake knives, iron plates and other utensils could also be seen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that Guangdong has begun to become like Xinjiang. In a store in Zhongcun, Panyu, all knives are locked up, and you need to show your ID card to buy them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, a netizen posted a warning: Companies should not learn from Pang Donglai. His company organized a study trip to Pang Donglai and imitated Pang Donglai to come up with an "employee proactive service awareness assessment standard". As a result, two employees applied for resignation in less than a week. Some netizens commented: Only Pang Donglai's service requirements were learned, and no one learned the benefits provided by Pang Donglai to employees.
Just like many companies learned Huawei's 996 and wolf culture, but no company was willing to increase wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a netizen submitted a post saying: Now banks have begun to semi-compulsory customers to open personal pension accounts.
"Today I went to the bank to change my card, and the bank staff semi-compulsory asked me to open a personal pension account. At that time, my ID card and the new card were still in the hands of the staff. I was in a hurry and didn't argue with him. In addition, there was an old lady in front of me. After the old lady completed the business, she was asked to open a personal pension in the same way."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Middle schools in many parts of the country have issued proposals to ban Christmas Eve.
A proposal from a high school in Hubei said: Please don't give me blessings on Western holidays, because I am Chinese, I am not a Christian, so why is there Christmas? I am not a child of God, so why is there Valentine's Day? I am not a Western citizen, so why should I celebrate Western holidays?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A decoration company in Dongying, Shandong Province issued a notice strictly prohibiting employees from participating in Christmas Eve parties and not forwarding content related to "foreign festivals" on social platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, major media outlets expressed their views: December 24 is not "Christmas Eve" but the 74th anniversary of the victory of the Battle of Changjin Lake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In 2019, veteran Guo Lei sent a letter of complaint to the National People's Congress representatives and posted a public complaint online, questioning the then Shaodong County Party Secretary Shen Zhiding for "illegally interfering in real estate commercial development, using public power to forcibly demolish, and compensating investors in the Shaodong Industrial Products Market at prices several times lower than the market price." Guo Lei's behavior was determined to be fabricating and publishing false information, constituting the crime of provoking disturbances, and was sentenced to three years in prison. Recently, the person he reported, the current Shaoyang Deputy Mayor Shen Zhiding, was dismissed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Wu Liufang, a former gymnastics champion who was once banned for causing controversy due to "skirting the edge" and then unbanned and gained millions of followers, was banned again. Douyin showed that her account "56 Xuejie" was banned for violating relevant laws and regulations, and the number of followers also dropped from more than 4 or 5 million to 44,000. Douyin announcement: The punishment is to maintain a clear cyberspace, and the MCN agency behind it was punished for manipulating its accounts including Wu Liufang to repeatedly post vulgar content to attract fans and divert traffic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment area, netizens all stood on Wu Liufang's side and supported her. Some netizens commented: "We are all Wu Liufang." "I can't decide my account?" "What's wrong with her? It's really inexplicable!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Brazilian officials revealed that 163 Chinese workers were found working in slavery-like conditions at the construction site of the Chinese automaker BYD's car factory in Bahia, Brazil.
And these workers sometimes worked seven consecutive days a week, violating Brazilian law on working hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 21 report: Inheriting the red gene and becoming the successor of the communist cause - "Communist Successor Series" was published, a political enlightenment book tailored for children.
Netizens replied "I am almost 40 years old, when can I take over the job?" "I am about to retire, and the call for me to take over has not come yet"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 23, Shunde, Guangdong. Netizens found that after tearing off the "eugenics" sticker on the wall, it showed that the previous promotion was "family planning"
